Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.name: current
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.abstract: The current as in top most view controller.

Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC4LLD.name: tree(depth:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC4LLD.abstract: Returns the view and all its subviews in sequence.

Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC4LLD.name: first(_:where:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC4LLD.abstract: Returns the first subview of a given type.

Extensions/UIView.html#/c:@CM@LLDO@@objc.name: first(in:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/c:@CM@LLDO@@objc.abstract: Returns the first subview of the calling type in the given view.

Extensions/UIView.html#/c:@CM@LLDO@@objc.name: containsText(_:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/c:@CM@LLDO@@objc.abstract: A Boolean indicating whether the view contains a given text.

Extensions/UIView.html#/c:@CM@LLDO@@objc.name: grep(_:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/c:@CM@LLDO@@objc.abstract: Returns all views that contain the given text.

Extensions/UIView.html#/c:@CM@LLDO@@objc.name: grep(_:in:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/c:@CM@LLDO@@objc.abstract: Returns all views that contain the given text.

Extensions/UIView.html#/c:@CM@LLDO@@objc.name: find(byAccessibilityID:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/c:@CM@LLDO@@objc.abstract: Returns the first view with the given accessibility identifier.

Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC4LLD.name: find(byAccessibilityID:in:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC4LLD.abstract: Returns the first view with the given accessibility identifier.

Extensions/UIView.html#/c:@CM@LLDO@@objc.name: enterText(_:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/c:@CM@LLDO@@objc.abstract: Sets the text of the closest UITextField or UITextView.

Extensions/UIView.html#/c:@CM@LLDO@@objc.name: highlight(_:insets:color:identifier:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/c:@CM@LLDO@@objc.abstract: Colors the areas covered by given insets.

Extensions/UIView.html#/c:@CM@LLDO@@objc.name: highlightSafeAreaInsets(_:color:depth:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/c:@CM@LLDO@@objc.abstract: Highlights the safe area insets of the receiver.

Extensions/UIView.html#/c:@CM@LLDO@@objc.name: highlightLayoutMargins(_:color:depth:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/c:@CM@LLDO@@objc.abstract: Highlights the layout margins of the receiver.

Extensions/UIView.html#/c:@CM@LLDO@@objc.name: caflush()
Extensions/UIView.html#/c:@CM@LLDO@@objc.abstract: Displays visual view changes that have been made while the program execution was paused.

Extensions/UIView.html#/c:@CM@LLDO@@objc.name: screenshot(_:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/c:@CM@LLDO@@objc.abstract: Saves a snapshot of the view as image.

Extensions/UIView.html#/c:@CM@LLDO@@objc.name: overlay(_:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/c:@CM@LLDO@@objc.abstract: Displays a semi transparent image on top of the receiver to be able to visually compare it to a reference design.

Extensions/NSObject.html#/s:So8NSObjectC.name: at(_:)
Extensions/NSObject.html#/s:So8NSObjectC.abstract: Returns the object at the given memory address casted to the type the method is called on.
